186413.description: Focus your strategy around Allied air superiority. Deploy elite infantry units from the air and support them with weapon drops from cargo planes. If the enemy deploys heavy armor, call in a P-47 Thunderbolt to strafe the target.

abilities.name: Paratroopers
abilities.description: Paratroopers are elite infantry that are often deployed behind enemy lines to tackle key objectives and sow confusion.

abilities.name: Paradrop M1 57mm Anti-Tank Gun
abilities.description: Paradrop in a M1 57mm Anti-Tank Gun to the battlefield that can be manned by allied infantry. This weapon is effective against armored vehicles.

abilities.name: Paradrop .50cal M2HB Heavy Machine Gun
abilities.description: Paradrop in a .50cal M2HB Heavy Machine Gun to the battlefield that can be manned by allied infantry. This weapon is effective against massed infantry when setup in a defensive position.

abilities.name: P-47 Rocket Strike
abilities.description: A P-47 Thunderbolt will attack vehicles in the targeted area with its 5" High Velocity Aircraft Rockets.

abilities.name: Pathfinders
abilities.description: Pathfinders can be deployed to the battlefield. Pathfinders are scout infantry who are powerful at long range and make it safer for troops to paradrop.

186415.description: Overwhelm the enemy with elite American armored vehicles and supporting infantry. Assault engineers can clear fortifications to allow vehicles to advance, while Sherman Bulldozers can be used to setup a roadblock or defensive line. The enemy’s strongpoints can be bombarded with 240mm artillery prior to an attack.

abilities.name: M10 'Wolverine' Tank Destroyer
abilities.description: Deploy an M10 Tank Destroyer. The 'Wolverine's'' 3 inch main gun is effective against all but the heaviest enemy armored vehicles. Effective vs tanks and vehicles.

abilities.name: 105mm Bulldozer Sherman
abilities.description: An M4A3 Sherman Bulldozer tank equipped with a 105mm howitzer for engaging infantry and structures can be called into the battlefield.

abilities.name: Assault Engineers
abilities.description: An Assault Engineer Squad with short range sub machine guns can be ordered in to the battlefield.

abilities.name: 240mm Howitzer Barrage
abilities.description: Call in a 240mm Howitzer barrage to level the target area.

abilities.name: Elite Vehicle Crews Upgrade
abilities.description: Vehicle crews are upgraded with Thompson submachine guns, increased repair speeds and earn veterancy at an increased rate.

451587.description: Overwhelm the enemy with elite American armored vehicles and supporting infantry. Assault engineers can clear fortifications to allow vehicles to advance, while Sherman Bulldozers can be used to setup a roadblock or defensive line. The enemy’s strongpoints can be bombarded with 240mm artillery prior to an attack.

abilities.name: M10 'Wolverine' Tank Destroyer
abilities.description: Deploy an M10 Tank Destroyer. The 'Wolverine's'' 3 inch main gun is effective against all but the heaviest enemy armored vehicles. Effective vs tanks and vehicles.

abilities.name: 105mm Bulldozer Sherman
abilities.description: An M4A3 Sherman Bulldozer tank equipped with a 105mm howitzer for engaging infantry and structures can be called into the battlefield.

abilities.name: Assault Engineers
abilities.description: An Assault Engineer Squad with short range sub machine guns can be ordered in to the battlefield.

abilities.name: 240mm Howitzer Barrage
abilities.description: Call in a 240mm Howitzer barrage to level the target area.

abilities.name: Elite Vehicle Crews Upgrade
abilities.description: Vehicle crews are upgraded with Thompson submachine guns, increased repair speeds and earn veterancy at an increased rate.

450482.description: Rifleman are equipped with extra utility to help strengthen forward positions. Utilize off map smoke to create avenues of attack. Elite Ranger troops are also available for deployment to help assault forward positions alongside the fierce M26 Pershing Heavy Tank. The combination of infantry and vehicles will allow your army to coordinate its attacks at a higher capacity.

abilities.name: Riflemen Field Defenses
abilities.description: Riflemen are trained to build Fighting Positions, lay sandbags for cover, and plant mines.

abilities.name: Off Map Smoke Barrage
abilities.description: Saturate target area with Smoke M89 shells to disrupt sight-lines.

abilities.name: Rangers
abilities.description: Rangers are a highly trained elite unit that specializes in marksmanship and frontline assault.

abilities.name: Combined Arms
abilities.description: Nearby infantry and vehicles coordinate to improve the effectiveness of one another.

abilities.name: M26 Pershing Heavy Tank
abilities.description: M26 Pershing can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit is effective against all targets.

186414.description: Infantry combined with artillery support, hold the enemy in place while bombarding them to dust. Advanced weapons such as the M1919A6 help infantry to hold the line while mobile artillery units move into place to break the attack. When the enemy is locked down, time on target artillery can rapidly destroy them.

abilities.name: M7B1 'Priest' Howitzer Motor Carriage
abilities.description: Deploy a M7B1 'Priest' Howitzer Motor Carriage. This mobile artillery unit is effective against static positions from range.

abilities.name: Time on Target Artillery Barrage
abilities.description: Calls down a coordinated artillery barrage on the target location. The shells land in quick succession.

abilities.name: M21 Mortar Half-track
abilities.description: An M21 Mortar Half-track can be ordered in to the battlefield. This mobile artillery unit is strong against static infantry at range.

abilities.name: M1919A6 Light Machine Gun
abilities.description: Provides access to the M1919A6 Light Machine Gun at the base.

abilities.name: Riflemen Field Defenses
abilities.description: Riflemen are trained to build Fighting Positions, lay sandbags for cover, and plant mines.

260696.description: Light vehicles provide valuable support to advancing American infantry units. Take advantage of a wide range of light US vehicles while upgraded Shermans engage the opposition. Heavy artillery can be used to destroy infantry or provide a support role against enemy vehicles.

abilities.name: M21 Mortar Half-track
abilities.description: An M21 Mortar Half-track can be ordered in to the battlefield. This mobile artillery unit is strong against static infantry at range.

abilities.name: Combined Arms
abilities.description: Nearby infantry and vehicles coordinate to improve the effectiveness of one another.

abilities.name: Cavalry Riflemen
abilities.description: Cavalry Riflemen can be dispatched to the battlefield. This versatile unit is armed for close-quarters combat.

abilities.name: (PASSIVE) Mechanized Groups
abilities.description: A WC51 Jeep and M3 Assault Halftrack can be deployed from the Barracks.

abilities.name: Reserve Armor
abilities.description: The powerful M4A3(76) Sherman tank can be requisitioned from the Battalion Command Post.

254449.description: Focused on intelligence and reconnaissance, this Company Commander relies on its ability to observe enemy movement and react quickly. This agile Commander will provide vital enemy intel using Pathfinders while also being able to swiftly respond with light operational support in the form of M8 Greyhounds and Airdropped Combat Groups.

abilities.name: M8 Greyhound
abilities.description: A M8 Greyhound can be deployed to the battlefield. This fast, lightly armored vehicle is effective against infantry.

abilities.name: Airdropped Combat Group
abilities.description: A Paratrooper Squad and an M1 75mm Pack Howitzer gun can be paradropped into the battlefield.

abilities.name: I&R Pathfinders
abilities.description: A squad of I&R Pathfinders can be deployed to the battlefield. These I&R Pathfinders are authorized to call down artillery barrages.

abilities.name: M83 Cluster Mines
abilities.description: M83 cluster bombs are scattered over the target area. Each cluster bomb is equipped with an anti-handling device and will detonate on impact.

abilities.name: Raid Tactics
abilities.description: Light Vehicles can rapidly capture territory and increases the sight range of infantry

261335.description: The Rifleman is the backbone of the American army emphasizing the American doctrine of versatility and individual firepower. Rear Echelons will have access to more versatile weapon packages. Mobile vehicles and a smokescreen can be used to support the riflemen advance.

abilities.name: Advanced Infantry Equipment
abilities.description: Riflemen squads are equipped with flares and can sprint while Rear Echelon squads can be upgraded with a flamethrower.

abilities.name: M4A3E8 Sherman 'Easy Eight'
abilities.description: A M4A3E8 Sherman 'Easy Eight' can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit is effective against all targets.

abilities.name: White Phosphorous Smoke Barrage
abilities.description: A white phosphorous smoke barrage is fired at the target area. This will obscure the sight of units and damage infantry over time.

abilities.name: M3 Half-track
abilities.description: M3 Half-tracks can be requisitioned to the battlefield to provide transportation and mobile reinforcement to units.

abilities.name: Riflemen Field Defenses
abilities.description: Riflemen are trained to build Fighting Positions, lay sandbags for cover, and plant mines.

450479.description: Coordinate your army with aerial support to help maneuver through the battlefield. Advance weapons such as the M1919A6 and the M5 Halftrack help infantry to hold the line while mobile artillery units move into place to break the attack.

abilities.name: M1919A6 Light Machine Gun
abilities.description: Provides access to the M1919A6 Light Machine Gun at the base.

abilities.name: M5 Half-track Transport
abilities.description: Deploy a M5 Half-track to the battlefield. The open-topped M5 is spacious enough to carry two squads, and its .50cal machine gun provides good firepower.

abilities.name: P47 Recon Run
abilities.description: Available planes will fly a high speed loiter of the targeted area.

abilities.name: P47 Strafing Run
abilities.description: P47 will strafe the target location. Damaging and suppressing infantry.

abilities.name: M4 Sherman Calliope
abilities.description: An upgraded version of the M4 Sherman, the Sherman Calliope has a mounted rocket projector rack on top of its existing turret. Designed to lay down a barrage of deadly fire.

452456.description: Overwhelm the enemy with forces specialized in aggressive urban combat. Line infantry receive urban equipment packages, while elite units such as Rangers and Sherman Calliopes inflict heavy casualties on enemy positions.

abilities.name: Urban Assault Kits
abilities.description: Rear Echelon squads can be upgraded with Rifle Grenade Launchers while Riflemen are equipped with incendiary devices.

abilities.name: Cover to Cover
abilities.description: Smoke drops on the target position and all infantry in the vicinity move with increased speed.

abilities.name: Rangers
abilities.description: Rangers are a highly trained elite unit that specializes in marksmanship and frontline assault.

abilities.name: M4A3 Sherman Assault Package
abilities.description: M4A3 Shermans can upgraded with a dozer blade that increases durability. Shermans can also fire white phosphorous shells to disrupt enemy positions.

abilities.name: M4 Sherman Calliope
abilities.description: An upgraded version of the M4 Sherman, the Sherman Calliope has a mounted rocket projector rack on top of its existing turret. Designed to lay down a barrage of deadly fire.

abilities.name: undefined
abilities.description: undefined

450553.description: This Regiment promotes defensive play. Utilize Infantry Sections to build defensive structures of your choice.  Upgrade your defensive structures for increased durability and improved utility. Precision Barrage is available to call in to disrupt enemy formations while infantry can be strengthened in friendly territory before support planes arrive.

abilities.name: Defensive Operations
abilities.description: Infantry squads and Royal Engineers are equipped with additional entrenching tools and equipment, allowing them to build additional emplacements and defenses.

abilities.name: Improved Fortification
abilities.description: Emplacements and Forward Assemblies will now have access to the “Improved Fortification” upgrade.

abilities.name: Advanced Assembly
abilities.description: Forward Assemblies will now have access to the “Advance Assembly” upgrade. Once researched, the assembly will dispatch royal engineers to repair.

abilities.name: Hold the Line
abilities.description: Infantry in friendly territories gain increased defense. After a period of time, Hawker Typhoons strafe enemies on the frontlines with rockets and machineguns.

abilities.name: Precision Barrage
abilities.description: Calls down a coordinated artillery barrage on the target location.

450074.description: Focused on reconnaissance and long range firepower the Royal Artillery Regiment caters to those who want to eradicate the enemy from a distance. Abilities are focused around locating the enemy and then deploying powerful ordinance to destroy them.

abilities.name: Early Warning
abilities.description: Nearby artillery batteries fire flares periodically over a frontline sector, revealing the area.

abilities.name: Concentration Barrage
abilities.description: Order all available 25-pounder howitzers in the British Army HQ to quickly fire at the targeted location.

abilities.name: Command Detachment “Valentine”
abilities.description: Allows for the deployment of the Mk. XI Valentine Command Tank to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Artillery Support Group “Sexton”
abilities.description: Deploy a Sexton Self-Propelled Artillery to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Perimeter Overwatch
abilities.description: Orders all available 25-pounder howitzers in the British Army HQ to overwatch friendly territory for a set duration.

450073.description: Commando Regiments provide numerous opportunities for hit and run attacks and striking the enemy’s most vulnerable points. Smoke Raids can be used to disrupt enemy supply lines before ordering a direct assault with grenades. Mortar and air support can provide cover for advancing troops while glider-borne commandos drop in behind the lines.

abilities.name: Mortar Cover
abilities.description: Nearby teams of light mortars will automatically attack enemies in the target area with a mix of high-explosive and white phosphorous shells. After a period of time flares will be dropped into the area.

abilities.name: Commando Glider Insertion
abilities.description: Deploy a Glider with a Commando squad to the target location. The Glider can reinforce nearby infantry squads.

abilities.name: Smoke Raid Operation
abilities.description: A smoke barrage will occur at the target position while infantry are masked by smoke grenades allowing them to hide in cover. Hostile territory will be neutralized quickly during this action.

abilities.name: Assault
abilities.description: Infantry squads move more quickly and have better combat capabilities Recon planes will flyover frontline enemy territories.

abilities.name: Air Supremacy Operation
abilities.description: A recon plane will be sent ahead before being followed up by attack planes. Heavy bombers will then deliver their payload over the target area.

450075.description: Royal Engineer Regiments provide benefits to vehicles and structures and the means to clear enemy positions. Command Vehicles can be designated to provide support to nearby units while vehicles and emplacements can repair themselves. Incendiary Mortars and a Churchill AVRE team can be used to eradicate fortifications.

abilities.name: Demolition Specialists “AVRE”
abilities.description: Deploy a Churchill AVRE tank armed with a powerful Petard Mortar.

abilities.name: Royal Engineer Recovery Squad
abilities.description: Dispatch a Royal Engineer Recovery Squad who can salvage vehicle wrecks for resources.

abilities.name: Anti-Building Flame Mortar Support
abilities.description: The target area will be steadily bombarded by 9.75-inch flame mortar rounds that are devastating to ambient structures.

abilities.name: Designate Command Vehicle
abilities.description: Designate a target vehicle as a Command Vehicle. The Command Vehicle will improve nearby units and increase the recharge rates of commander abilities.

abilities.name: Vehicle Crew Repairs
abilities.description: Target damaged vehicle will stop and be rapidly repaired by its crew. The vehicle will be covered by a smoke barrage while repairing.

452455.description: Hit hard and fast by utilizing a range of Lend-Leased American equipment such as Thompsons SMGs, 81mm Mortars, M5 Half-tracks and M10 Achillies Tank Destroyers.

abilities.name: Assault Infantry Sections
abilities.description: Infantry Sections equipped with Assault Packages.

abilities.name: M1 81mm Mortar Team
abilities.description: Highly mobile mortar teams provide effective indirect fire support on the battlefield.

abilities.name: M5 Half-track
abilities.description: Transports and reinforces infantry squads. Can be upgraded with an M45 Quad mount Anti-Air gun.

abilities.name: M10 'Achillies' Tank Destroyer
abilities.description: Deploy an M10 Tank Destroyer. The 'Achilles' 3 inch main gun is effective against all but the heaviest enemy armored vehicles. Effective vs tanks and vehicles.

abilities.name: Vehicle Crew Repairs
abilities.description: Target damaged vehicle will stop and be rapidly repaired by its crew. The vehicle will be covered by a smoke barrage while repairing.

450554.description: This Regiment provides numerous opportunities to carry out aggressive plays. Utilize flamethrowers on the royal engineer to clear out garrisoned positions. Create advantageous scenarios by attacking behind enemy lines with Commandos. Advance Cover Combat will allow your infantry sections to make aggressive attacks in open areas of the map. The Land Mattress rocket artillery will help you dislodge entrenched positions. Activate Vehicle Crew Repair to reduce the time it takes to repair damaged vehicles.

abilities.name: Royal Engineer Recovery Squad
abilities.description: Dispatch a Royal Engineer Recovery Squad who can salvage vehicle wrecks for resources.

abilities.name: M1 82mm Mortar Team
abilities.description: Highly mobile mortar teams provide effective indirect fire support on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Infiltration Commandos
abilities.description: Elite infiltration troops who are experts at disrupting enemy supply lines. Infiltration Commandos can be deployed from any ambient building.

abilities.name: Vehicle Crew Repairs
abilities.description: Target damaged vehicle will stop and be rapidly repaired by its crew. The vehicle will be covered by a smoke barrage while repairing.

abilities.name: Land Mattress
abilities.description: Deploy a Land Mattress rocket artillery.

450268.description: Tactical Support Regiments help out behind the lines, improving existing units and providing fire support to allies. Designate a Command Vehicle to improve nearby forces or use air support to provide equipment to frontline troops. Artillery can cover advancing troops while Raid Sections cut-off key points. A Forward Observation Post can be used to provide rapid responses to nearby threats.

abilities.name: Raid Section
abilities.description: Request a mobile Raid Section that excels at harassing enemy lines and mobile warfare.

abilities.name: Designate Command Vehicle
abilities.description: Designate a target vehicle as a Command Vehicle. The Command Vehicle will improve nearby units and increase the recharge rates of commander abilities.

abilities.name: Vanguard Operation “Crocodile”
abilities.description: Nearby batteries will fire a quick illumination shot to the target area while a Churchill Crocodile is deployed to the field.

abilities.name: Air Resupply Operation
abilities.description: Air support will automatically drop medical and weapon supply crates on targeted friendly territories. Infantry units will move and reinforce faster in friendly territory.

abilities.name: Forward Observation Post
abilities.description: Designate an occupied ambient building or Forward Assembly as a Forward Observation Post. These positions can direct special air and artillery strike abilities

450243.description: The Vanguard Operations Regiment utilizes a mixed force of air and ground support to maintain a strong frontline presence. Launch the Forward Logistics Glider to provide early field support, advance quickly with the Raid Operation, and call for Strafing Support to maintain air supremacy. Finally, the potent Vanguard Operations Crocodile can be deployed in order to make the decisive thrust into enemy territory.

abilities.name: Raid Operation
abilities.description: Allows all your infantry and British vehicles to capture points quickly. Use this to break through enemy lines.

abilities.name: Forward Logistics Glider
abilities.description: Deploy a Forward Glider Headquarters. The headquarters can deploy frontline team weapons, commandos, and act as a retreat point.

abilities.name: Vehicle Crew Repairs
abilities.description: Target damaged vehicle will stop and be rapidly repaired by its crew. The vehicle will be covered by a smoke barrage while repairing.

abilities.name: Strafing Support
abilities.description: Two Hawker Typhoons target the designated area with rockets and machine guns.

abilities.name: Vanguard Operation “Crocodile”
abilities.description: Nearby batteries will fire a quick illumination shot to the target area while a Churchill Crocodile is deployed to the field.

450286.description: The versatile Special Weapons Regiment values combined arms and well-coordinated tactics. Infantry Sections are granted optional anti-tank upgrades and provided with powerful anti-armor grenades. Resupply Half-tracks and Typhoon strafing runs grant your infantry more staying power on the front lines. Use improved Coordinated Fire and devastating Crocodile flamethrower tanks to finish off your foes.

abilities.name: Vanguard Operation “Crocodile”
abilities.description: Nearby batteries will fire a quick illumination shot to the target area while a Churchill Crocodile is deployed to the field.

abilities.name: Tank Hunters Infantry Section
abilities.description: Tank Hunter Infantry Sections can be deployed. They are equipped with Boys AT Rifles and can detect nearby vehicles. They also have access to anti-vehicle HEAT grenades.

abilities.name: Resupply Half-track
abilities.description: Dispatch a Resupply M3 Half-track. This unique Half-track can reinforce units and deploy weapons on the frontline.

abilities.name: Hold The Line!
abilities.description: Infantry units in friendly territories gain increased defense. After a period of time, Hawker Typhoons strafe enemies on the frontlines with rockets and machineguns.

abilities.name: Concentrated Fire Operation
abilities.description: Coordinate a massive bombardment on the target zone. One heavy artillery shell will be fired first before being followed up by a series of 25 pounder shells.

6116.description: The Blitzkrieg doctrine stressed combined operations; aircraft supporting armor which in turn should exploit breakthroughs won by infantry.

abilities.name: Command Tank
abilities.description: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Panzer Tactician
abilities.description: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.

abilities.name: Stuka Close Air Support
abilities.description: A Stuka JU-87 will patrol the designated area, targeting enemy units with heavy 37mm cannons.

abilities.name: Reconnaissance Overflight
abilities.description: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.

abilities.name: Tactical Movement
abilities.description: All infantry are ordered to move at their fastest available speed for the duration of the ability. Does not affect anti-tank gun squads.

6118.description: The Infantry doctrine focuses on numerous infantry units supported by artillery to advance on enemy positions. Officers can support rapid infantry pushes while light artillery can quickly react to enemy strongpoints.

abilities.name: Fragmentation Bomb
abilities.description: High-explosive fragmentation bombs are dropped on the target location.

abilities.name: Veteran Squad Leaders
abilities.description: Infantry squads can be upgraded with veteran squad leaders and training to improve combat effectiveness.

abilities.name: Stormtroopers
abilities.description: Elite infiltration troops who are experts at disrupting enemy supply lines. These units can be deployed from any ambient building.

abilities.name: Assault and Hold
abilities.description: Infantry are given the order to launch a rapid assault. Units will capture territory more quickly and fire more accurately.

abilities.name: Sd.Kfz. 250/1 Half-track
abilities.description: The Sd.Kfz. 250/1 can be deployed from the Kampfgruppe Headquarters to provide infantry support.

6117.description: Mechanized forces had a tremendous amount of organic firepower including artillery and mobile mortars to smash enemy defenses.

abilities.name: Command Tank
abilities.description: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Vehicle Critical Repair
abilities.description: All vehicle crews can do emergency repairs to restore health and remove critical damage.

abilities.name: Sd.Kfz. 250/1 Half-track
abilities.description: The Sd.Kfz 250/1 can be deployed from the Kampfgruppe Headquarters to provide infantry support

abilities.name: Spotting Scope
abilities.description: Vehicles can be equipped with spotting scopes that allow them to see farther when stationary.

abilities.name: leFH 18 Artillery
abilities.description: This light 10.5cm Field Howitzer doesn't have the destructive power of some Soviet artillery, but it counters with a good rate of fire and reasonably long range.

7554.description: Close Air Support can provide cover for frontline engagements by utilizing the powerful weapons of the versatile JU-87 and its destructive power.

abilities.name: Stuka Reconnaissance Pass
abilities.description: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.

abilities.name: Stuka JU-87D Anti-Infantry Strafe
abilities.description: Stuka JU-87D will strafe the target location with its powerful 7.92mm MG 17 machine guns.

abilities.name: Stuka JU-87 Anti-Tank Strafe
abilities.description: Stuka JU-87 will strafe the target location with its powerful 37mm cannons.

abilities.name: Supply Drop Zone
abilities.description: Cargo planes will fly over a designated Fuel or Munitions point, dropping off resource crates that can be recovered by infantry.

abilities.name: Stuka Bombing Strike
abilities.description: A JU-87D Stuka will dive in and drop a 50kg bomb on the target location. Capture points are neutralized if hit.

5568.description: Support an aggressive strategy; use supply trucks to augment your munitions or fuel resources, support local attacks with the Artillery Field Officer, shatter enemy infantry attacks with air support, and take the fight to the enemy with the famous Tiger heavy tank.

abilities.name: Cargo Truck
abilities.description: An Opel Blitz supply truck can ensure a greater return of resources from owned territories.

abilities.name: Artillery Field Officer
abilities.description: An Artillery Field Officer can be deployed to the battlefield. The officer can call in heavy mortar support and his retinue are armed with MP40 submachine guns for short-range combat.

abilities.name: Strafing Run
abilities.description: The JU-87D will use its two MG-17 machine guns to target enemy infantry and suppress them.

abilities.name: Tiger Tank
abilities.description: Allows the requisition of the Tiger Heavy Tank to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Fragmentation Bomb
abilities.description: High-explosive fragmentation bombs are dropped on the target location.

5570.description: A hard hitting defensive strategy; deploy hard hitting artillery options, use smoke to protect your vehicles  and mask movement, use Panzer IV Js to reinforce the line, and destroy enemies from long range with the powerful Pak43 anti-tank gun.

abilities.name: Panzer Tactician
abilities.description: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.

abilities.name: Pak 43 Emplacement
abilities.description: Pioneers and Sturmpioneers are able to construct powerful Pak 43 88mm anti-tank emplacements.

abilities.name: Hull Down
abilities.description: Tanks crews can hulldown their vehicles into a defensive position, improving their effectiveness.

abilities.name: Panzer IV Ausf. J
abilities.description: The Panzer IV J variant can be built from the HQ once either Support Armor Korps or Heavy Panzer Korps have been deployed.

abilities.name: Railway Artillery Support
abilities.description: Off-map railway artillery will fire three large caliber shells at the designated target.

5571.description: Support a defensive strategy with the power of the Command Tank and control space with artillery to establish a strong front line. 250/7 mortar half-tracks, and pre-sited Sector Artillery deny map control to the enemy, while relief infantry can replace any losses.

abilities.name: Command Tank
abilities.description: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed on the battlefield.

abilities.name: SdKfz 250/7 Mortar Half-track
abilities.description: The SdKfz 250/7 Mortar Half-track with its 8cm mortar can provide vital battlefield support for infantry forces.

abilities.name: Relief Infantry
abilities.description: Command releases reserve infantry to replace losses suffered during combat. Forces will be replaced with Osttruppen infantry.

abilities.name: Sector Artillery
abilities.description: Enemy units entering a targeted sector are barraged with 10.5cm artillery.

abilities.name: Forward Supply Station
abilities.description: Allows ambient buildings to be converted into a Forward Supply Station. This depot will allow infantry to reinforce and automatically repair nearby vehicles. Vehicles will also fire faster when near this structure. Repair bunkers are also available.

5927.description: Enhance the survivability of your tanks and vehicles; defensive smoke, the ability to go hull-down, and a Panzer IV Command Tank ensure your vehicles can live longer and fight harder, while Spotting Scopes and aerial recon allow you to see threats and engage them at long range wiith the Elefant Heavy Tank Destroyer.it

abilities.name: Panzer Tactician
abilities.description: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.

abilities.name: Hull Down
abilities.description: Tanks crews can hulldown their vehicles into a defensive position, improving their effectiveness.

abilities.name: Elefant Tank Destroyer
abilities.description: Allows the requisition of the Elefant Tank Destroyer to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Command Tank
abilities.description: A command tank that improves nearby forces can be deployed to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Reconnaissance Overflight
abilities.description: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.

7538.description: The Luftwaffe Supply doctrine utilizes the German Air Force in a support role for the ground troops. Ju52 cargo planes can deliver valuable weapons and medical supplies to troops on the ground. Officers can direct planes to provide tactical air support while bombers can rain death from overhead.

abilities.name: Air-Dropped Medical Supplies
abilities.description: Paradrop medical supplies at a target area. Heals and inspires nearby units when picked up.

abilities.name: Luftwaffe Field Officer
abilities.description: A Luftwaffe Field Officer and his retinue are dispatched to provide support on the front-line.

abilities.name: Supply Drop
abilities.description: A cargo plane will fly over the designated area and deliver a small amount of fuel and munitions. The crates also contain an MG34 and a Pak 40 that can be manned by infantry.

abilities.name: Incendiary Bombing Run
abilities.description: A Stuka will drop incendiary bombs on the target location.

abilities.name: Heavy Bombing Run
abilities.description: A Heinkel 111 will fly over the target area and bomb the location with a mixture of high-explosive and incendiary bombs.

7541.description: This doctrine provides additional defensive gameplay options. Additional structures can be created to slow the advance of the enemy, while powerful defensive weapons such as the Pak 43 and Sector Artillery will crush any breakthroughs.

abilities.name: Sector Artillery
abilities.description: Enemy units entering a targeted sector are barraged with 10.5cm artillery.

abilities.name: Pak 43 Emplacement
abilities.description: Pioneers and Sturmpioneers are able to construct powerful Pak 43 88mm anti-tank emplacements.

abilities.name: Defensive Fortifications
abilities.description: Allows infantry to construct sandbags, barbed wire and trenches while Pioneers can now also construct tank traps and concrete bunkers.

abilities.name: Osttruppen Squad
abilities.description: Deploy weak but numerous Osttruppen infantry to the battlefield.

abilities.name: StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun
abilities.description: Allows the requestion of the StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun onto the battlefield.

7537.description: Utilizing the best trained and equipped units in the German Army, this doctrine focuses on high quality troops and vehicles. You and your allies units can be trained to have a higher level of veteran status, using the quality of your forces to overpower raw numbers. When the battle has reached its tipping point, an elite Tiger Ace can be deployed to turn the tide.

abilities.name: Stormtroopers
abilities.description: Elite infiltration troops who are experts at disrupting enemy supply lines. These units can be deployed from any ambient building.

abilities.name: Jaeger Light Infantry Upgrade
abilities.description: Grenadiers, Panzergrenadiers, and Stormtroopers can be upgraded with this package which provides them with G43 rifles and includes training in interrogation.

abilities.name: Panzer Tactician
abilities.description: All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.

abilities.name: Tiger Ace
abilities.description: High command sends in a legendary Tiger Ace. Only one is available at a time. Available once the Heavy Panzer Korps is deployed.

abilities.name: Model 24 Stun Grenades
abilities.description: Grenadiers, Panzergrenadiers, and Stormtroopers can throw Model 24 stun grenades, which will stun enemy infantry.

7540.description: Combine stealth and mobility to outflank the enemy and destroy them. Stormtroopers can be deployed to scout ahead or cut off the enemies supply lines, while vehicles and air support can be utilized to complete the encirclement. With the enemy surrounded, Crush the Pocket will concentrate firepower to eradicate them.

abilities.name: Breakthrough

Assault Grenadiers allow for early attacks on enemy strongpoints, follow up with an elite mechanized assault group and infantry support StuG III Ausf. E Assault Gun. Finish the enemy with the fearsome Tiger PzKpfw VI Heavy Tank.

abilities.description: Using underground infiltration units, temporarily reveal all enemy units on the mini-map.

abilities.name: Mark Vehicle
abilities.description: Targeted vehicle is subject to an increase in focused fire from nearby opponents.

abilities.name: Radio Intercept
abilities.description: Intercepts enemy radio transmissions providing valuable intel on enemy actions.

7545.description: Disable enemy tanks and armored vehicles more easily with a variety of upgrades and abilities to support existing AT options. B-4 203mm Howitzers can shell the enemy from afar and when that fails IL-2 planes can deliver a devastating anti-tank bombing run.

abilities.name: Tank Hunter Ambush Tactics
abilities.description: All mobile anti-tank gun crews and armored vehicles can camouflage themselves to avoid detection.

abilities.name: IL-2 PTAB Anti-Tank Bombing Run
abilities.description: Drops a multitude of smaller anti-tank bombs over a wide area.

abilities.name: B-4 203mm Howitzer
abilities.description: The B-4 203mm Howitzer can be built by Combat Engineers. It fires massive shells with a large area of effect and can be used for direct fire against vehicles.

abilities.name: Anti-Tank Fortifications
abilities.description: Light AT Mines, Bunkers and Tank Traps can be constructed to delay enemy attacks.

abilities.name: Conscript PTRS Package
abilities.description: Conscripts can be upgraded with Tank Hunter Packages to improve their potency against armored vehicles.

7247.description: Focused on defending dense urban centers with extreme resilience, this doctrine offers additional means to fight in tight spaces. Forward Headquarters will offer a frontline staging ground to support nearby troops, while traps and incendiary artillery slow the enemy advance.

abilities.name: Shock Troops
abilities.description: Special Command Troops can be deployed to the battlefield. Click and select location to deploy.

abilities.name: M-42 45mm AT Gun
abilities.description: Special light M-42 45mm AT Gun can be deployed to the battlefield. Click and select location to deploy.

abilities.name: Forward Headquarters
abilities.description: Designate a Forward HQ or build a field camp. These structures can provide nearby infantry units with medical attention, reinforce understrength units, and inspiration in combat.

abilities.name: Booby Trap Territory
abilities.description: A trap can be placed on a point that will automatically attack enemy units who try to capture that territory.

abilities.name: KV-2 Heavy Assault Tank
abilities.description: A KV-2 Heavy Assault Tank can be ordered in to the battlefield.

5923.description: Heavy and mobile armored warfare; mix the power of the IS-2 Heavy Tank with the mobility of the T-34/85 for armored versatility. Air power can destroy enemy forces identified arriving on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Radio Intercept
abilities.description: Intercepts enemy radio transmissions providing valuable intel on enemy actions.

abilities.name: Vehicle Crew Repair Training
abilities.description: Vehicle crews gain an ability to repair battlefield damage on their vehicles once they leave combat.

abilities.name: IS-2 Heavy Tank
abilities.description: An IS-2 Heavy Tank can be deployed to the battlefield.

abilities.name: T-34/85 Medium Tank
abilities.description: A T-34/85, with a powerful 85mm gun, can be requisitioned for the battlefield.

abilities.name: IL-2 Sturmovik Attacks
abilities.description: IL-2 Sturmovik will loiter over the battlefield, strafing targets of opportunity with its powerful 23mm cannons.

5925.description: Use fear to force the enemy back. Airborne troops can emerge from buildings to ambush enemies, propaganda strikes can sap the enemy's will to fight, while howitzers shell their positions from afar. Finish them off with KV-8s and IL-2 bomb strikes that can shatter enemy lines.

abilities.name: Airborne Guard Troops
abilities.description: Guards Airborne Troops who have previously infiltrated the battlefield by airdrop can be requisitioned. Can be upgraded for short or long range combat.

abilities.name: IL-2 Precision Bombing Strike
abilities.description: The IL-2 will make a high-speed bombing run, clustering four FAB-50 50kg bombs into the target area.

abilities.name: Fear Propaganda Artillery
abilities.description: Airburst propaganda leaflets make targeted soldiers question the morality of their actions.

abilities.name: KV-8 Flamethrower Tank
abilities.description: KV-8 Flamethrower tanks can be ordered to the battlefield from the Mechanized Armor Kampaneya. This tank excels against infantry and light vehicles.

abilities.name: ML-20 152mm Gun-Howitzer
abilities.description: The powerful 152mm ML-20 Gun-Howitzer can be built by Combat Engineers. Its shells can reach vast areas of the battlefield.

450495.description: Utilize advance field reconnaissance to coordinate your army positioning. Territory that you are in control of will be rigged with flares to send early warning from enemy attacks. Coordinate battles within friendly territory to gain a tactical advantage. A Goliath also available for deployment to help dislodge forward defenses as well as aerial Stukas are prepared to assault any position.

abilities.name: For The Fatherland!
abilities.description: Infantry in friendly territory will recieve a defensive bonus for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Sector Assault
abilities.description: Stukas will automatically recon and attack enemy units in the designated area.

abilities.name: Early Warning Systems
abilities.description: Advanced systems in the form of warning flares and sWS receivers are available for use. Goliaths now available and can demolish enemy fortifications from a safe distance.

abilities.name: leFH 18 Artillery
abilities.description: This light 10.5cm Field Howitzer doesn't have the destructive power of some Soviet artillery, but it counters with a good rate of fire and reasonably long range.

abilities.name: Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad
abilities.description: A Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad can be deployed to the battlefield. This small squad is ideal for recon and scavenging resources.

186419.description: Break through the enemy line with heavy armor and elite infantry support. Panzerfusiliers will recon the enemy position while the "Jagdtiger" Panzerjäger Tiger Ausf. B Heavy Tank Destroyer crushes the enemy armor allowing infantry to advance.

abilities.name: Assault Artillery
abilities.description: Barrages the target zone with high explosive shells followed by a smokescreen to cover the advance.

abilities.name: Breakthrough Tactics
abilities.description: Infantry units are trained to push through enemy lines more quickly. Enemy territory is neutralized quickly.

abilities.name: Panzerfüsiliers
abilities.description: Panzerfüsiliers can be deployed to the battlefield. These versatile troops can fulfill a number of battlefield roles through their upgrades.

abilities.name: Jagdtiger Panzerjäger Tiger Ausf. B
abilities.description: The intimidating "Jagdtiger" Panzerjäger Tiger Ausf. B with its 128mm PaK 44 can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit has immense range and damage against vehicles.

abilities.name: Sturm Offizier
abilities.description: Deploy an Sturm Offizier and his Obersoldaten bodyguard. This front-line combat officer improves has a number of abilities to weaken the enemy and support nearby troops.

257800.description: Use superior equipment and experienced crewmen to augment your armored forces. Plan your tactics with upgraded scout cars or recover your armor with an Emergency Repair. Use the Sturmtiger to spearhead the assault.

abilities.name: Sd.KFz. 221
abilities.description: The Sd.Kfz. 221 is a fast scout car armed with a machine gun to engage infantry targets.

abilities.name: Emergency Repairs
abilities.description: Vehicle crews gain the ability to repair critical damage on their vehicles.

abilities.name: Panzer Commander
abilities.description: The Panzer IV, Panther, & King Tiger can be upgraded with a Panzer Commander that can survey the battlefield and call in coordinated artillery strikes.

abilities.name: High Explosive Anti-Tank (HEAT) Shells
abilities.description: Tanks are now issued HEAT ammunition for increased penetration.

abilities.name: Sturmtiger
abilities.description: The Sturmmörserwagen 606/4 mit 38cm RW 61, more commonly known as the Sturmtiger, is an assault vehicle capable of firing a 376kg rocket-assisted shell devastating to enemy force concentrations or structures.

450494.description: Assault enemy positions with upgraded infantry supported by trucks that keep units supplied with critical munitions. Call in an off-map rocket barrage which will bombard the area with multiple 280mm rocket artillery before deploying the Flammpanzer 38 to clear out remaining resistance.

abilities.name: Assault Package
abilities.description: Sturmpioneers can upgrade to Flammenwerfer 35 Flamethrower while Volksgrenadiers can be equipped with MP40s and a variety of grenades.

abilities.name: Incendiary Munitions
abilities.description: Le.IG 18s are given incendiary rounds to saturate target zones with fire.

abilities.name: Opel Blitz Truck
abilities.description: An Opel Blitz is dispatched to the target area. This lightly protected truck is capable of supplying troops with munitions while carrying and reinforcing infantry on the field.

abilities.name: Flammpanzer 38 'Hetzer'
abilities.description: The Flammpanzer 38 is a Jagdpanzer 38 modified with a Keobe flamethrower in place of the main gun.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Call in an Off-map Barrage of devastating 280mm Rockets to target area.

259929.description: Hold back the enemy at all costs with heavy defensive structures. Infantry can construct advanced defensive buildings. Heavy weapons such as the Pak43 and leFH 18 can be combined with zeroing artillery to zone out and eradicate breakthroughs.

abilities.name: Heavy Fortifications
abilities.description: Sturmpioneers can construct Tank Traps, S-Mine Fields, Flak Emplacements, and Trenches. Volksgrenadiers can construct bunkers and barbed wire.

abilities.name: Pak 43 Emplacement
abilities.description: Pioneers and Sturmpioneers are able to construct powerful Pak 43 88mm anti-tank emplacements.

abilities.name: Zeroing Artillery
abilities.description: Automatically attacks visible enemy units in the target area. Artillery rate of fire ramps up the longer the target is visible.

abilities.name: leFH 18 Artillery
abilities.description: This light 10.5cm Field Howitzer doesn't have the destructive power of some Soviet artillery, but it counters with a good rate of fire and reasonably long range.

abilities.name: For The Fatherland
abilities.description: Infantry in friendly territory will recieve a defensive bonus for the duration of the ability.

452452.description: Command all out assaults with elite infantry units, air reconnaissance, and devastating armored command elements, including the Pzkfw VI Tiger Ausf. E.

abilities.name: Panzerfüsiliers
abilities.description: Panzerfüsiliers can be deployed to the battlefield. These versatile troops can fulfill a number of battlefield roles through their upgrades.

abilities.name: Stuka Smoke Drop
abilities.description: Large smoke pots are dropped on the battlefield, blocking line of sight.

abilities.name: Infrared StG44 Package
abilities.description: Obersoldaten squads can be upgraded with StG44's equipped with infrared scopes. These special weapons are powerful against enemy units in cover, and in medium range combat.

abilities.name: Panzer Commander
abilities.description: The Panzer IV, Panther, & King Tiger can be upgraded with a Panzer Commander that can survey the battlefield and call in coordinated artillery strikes.

abilities.name: Tiger Tank
abilities.description: Excellent armor and an even better gun. The Tiger can tackle any foe on the battlefield. Available once Schwerer Panzer Headquarters is deployed.

186418.description: Supporting forces of the Luftwaffe will fight on the ground alongside the army. Recon enemy positions and set up heavy fortifications and flak emplacements while using the elite Fallschirmjäger to flank and destroy. Use an airborne assault to hold key enemy territories.

abilities.name: Fallschirmjäger
abilities.description: Fallschirmjäger can be deployed to the battlefield. These elite infantry units are excellent against infantry at all ranges.

abilities.name: Stuka Smoke Reconnaissance
abilities.description: Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces and drop smoke at the target area.

abilities.name: Valiant Assault
abilities.description: Inspire mobile infantry troops to move quickly and attack more effectively.

abilities.name: Heavy Fortifications
abilities.description: Sturmpioneers can construct Tank Traps, S-Mine Fields, Flak Emplacements, and Trenches. Volksgrenadiers can construct bunkers and barbed wire.

abilities.name: Airborne Assault
abilities.description: Two JU-87 Stukas will strafe and suppress infantry then patrol the area, targeting enemy vehicles with heavy 37mm cannons. Fallschirmjager squads may be reinforced anywhere on the battlefield.

259657.description: Gather whatever resources you can from the battlefield and defeated enemies. Troops are trained to be more thorough in their salvage operations while infiltrating light infantry can disrupt enemy supplies and lay traps. With a large amount of resources stockpiled, more devastating artillery can be deployed on the enemy strongpoints.

abilities.name: Infiltration Tactics
abilities.description: Infantry who are kept out of combat for long periods of time will gain the ability to surprise assault, allowing them to use a special grenade ability.

abilities.name: Thorough Salvage
abilities.description: Salvaging will take more time, but also yields munitions resource. Volksgrenadiers can also be upgraded with repair kits.

abilities.name: 105mm Howitzer Barrage
abilities.description: A barrage of 105mm artillery shells will be fired at the target location. The number of shells fired depends on your current stored munitions.

abilities.name: Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad
abilities.description: A Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad can be deployed to the battlefield. This small squad is ideal for recon and scavenging resources.

abilities.name: Flakpanzer IV Ostwind
abilities.description: The Flakpanzer IV Ostwind can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit is effective against infantry and aircraft.

Troops are trained to be more thorough in their salvage operations while infiltrating light infantry can disrupt enemy supplies and lay traps. With a large amount of resources stockpiled, more devastating artillery can be deployed on the enemy strongpoints.

abilities.name: Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad
abilities.description: A Jaeger Light Infantry Recon Squad can be deployed to the battlefield. This small squad is ideal for recon and scavenging resources.

abilities.name: Flakpanzer IV Ostwind
abilities.description: The Flakpanzer IV Ostwind can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit is effective against infantry and aircraft.

186417.description: Use stealth and surprise to catch the enemy off guard and defeat the before they can react. Units can hide themselves from the enemy until they are ready to strike. When attacking, combine a Panther PzKpfw V Command Tank with a grenade assault.

abilities.name: Sturm Offizier
abilities.description: Deploy an Sturm Offizier and his Obersoldaten bodyguard. This front-line combat officer improves has a number of abilities to weaken the enemy and support nearby troops.

abilities.name: Infiltration Tactics
abilities.description: Infantry who are kept out of combat for long periods of time will gain the ability to surprise assault, allowing them to use a special grenade ability.

abilities.name: Radio Silence
abilities.description: When activated, all units are hidden on the enemy mini-map.

abilities.name: Panther Command Tank
abilities.description: An elite panther leader can be deployed to the battle, improves the sight and movement of vehicles.

abilities.name: Infrared StG44 Package
abilities.description: Obersoldaten squads can be upgraded with StG44's equipped with infrared scopes. These special weapons are powerful against enemy units in cover, and in medium range combat.

abilities.name: Fallschirmjäger
abilities.description: Fallschirmjäger can be deployed to the battlefield. These elite infantry units are excellent against infantry at all ranges.

abilities.name: MG42 Heavy Machine Gun Team
abilities.description: A MG42 Heavy Machine Gun Team can be deployed to the battlefield. This weapon is effective at suppressing massed infantry.

abilities.name: Panzerfüsiliers
abilities.description: Panzerfüsiliers can be deployed to the battlefield. These versatile troops can fulfill a number of battlefield roles through their upgrades.

abilities.name: Flakpanzer IV Ostwind
abilities.description: The Flakpanzer IV Ostwind can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit is effective against infantry and aircraft.

abilities.description: The intimidating "Jagdtiger" Panzerjäger Tiger Ausf. B with its 128mm PaK 44 can be deployed to the battlefield. This unit has immense range and damage against vehicles.
